home.title: Share Code Snippets with
home.subtitle: A platform to share, discover, and analyze code snippets. Get instant time complexity estimates and organize with tags.
home.codeSnippetsDesc: Create, edit, and share code snippets with syntax highlighting
home.smartTaggingDesc: Organize snippets by language and topic with shareable tag pages
home.userProfilesDesc: Public profiles showcasing your shared snippets and contributions
home.complexityAnalysisDesc: Get instant time complexity estimates for your algorithms
home.ctaSubtitle: Join our community of developers and start sharing your best code snippets today.
